message.title: Unifying America. One waffle at a time.
message.paragraph:
Capitalizing on the irreverent tone of voice Waffle Stop is known for, Red Square created a social media campaign that lived at the center of an incredible cultural moment. One nation, under waffles.

Scroll down to check out the results.

data.title:
Waffle Stop was busier October 2020 at 50% dining room capacity than the previous year at 100%.
Social media was the key driver of website traffic growth during the campaign period.

items.headline: Growth in Facebook to website visits
